subject: Soccer
World Cup 2018 (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Argentina, playing without Lionel Messi and two other stars, won at Colombia, 1-0, on Lucas Biglia’s first-half goal.
snippet: Argentina, playing without Lionel Messi and two other stars, won at Colombia, 1-0, on Lucas Biglia’s first-half goal.
